column5: Awesome fish Jim!! that is truly a beauty.
Thanks for the replies everyone.  I appreciate it  It was a lot of fun.
Lac Seul beauty for sure! Fish of a lifetime, congrat's!
AWESOME FISH!... and on a top water  NICE!!!!
awesome ski man ..that is a true giant congrats
Now that's a beauty  Congrats..
congrats on that tank!
That is a real beauty. What a monster. That would be awesome!!!

That's an incredible fish!!  Truly a giant..  a behemoth in its prime..  She must have the designated grim reaper for that bay..  I wonder though, how old would a fish like that be?  AWESOME. Congrats!  HD
sweet.. thanks for the post
Jim,I made a post afew days ago titled "flat-back muskys"take a look.would like to know if yours was similar.
A true beauty!  and on a topwater!   congrats!
Wow Jim, that is a monster.  Way to go buddy  Joey
Wow! What a great fish Jim! Congrats!
Beautiful Muskie!  Long AND fat!
Awesome fish man!!! What type of topwater did you get her on?
Thats a helluva fish!!!  congrats!!!
WOW very nice fish indeed Jim. That will stay in your memory, just like a first buck. Congrats.
That's one very impressive Ski Jim.   Congrats
Congrats man a big musky for sure !!!!!  great pictures as well  ,...cheers
Wow Jim one Helluva a long Ski I am looking forward to catching my first one soon
Congrats on that fish. What a monster!!!

Wow Misty Wow!! Fish of a lifetime for sure. She must have had a ton or energy left after netting her so quick. I've been fortunate to have fished Lac Seul before and it is a little piece of heaven. What lodge were you staying with? Look forward to your full report when you get the chance.  Cheers, 1leg
SWEEEEEEEET!!!!  Congrats on the PB....a real chunky muskie!!
Congratulations!  Look at the head on that brute - and a boatside hit too - talk about exciting.  I bet your still shaking!
"I think we are going to need a bigger boat"  I only dream of seeing a fish like that behind my bait, let alone getting it to strike!!
WTG Jim... very impressive! HH
Great fish! Read once that Lac Seul muskies have the highest rate of growth of anywhere due to shorter feeding seasons, and abundance of forage. What a great trip that must be. Thanks for post, ehg
HOLY CRAP! THat fish is almost as long as I am tall !  WTG

I'm on my way back from Sioux lookout but was dying to put at least this report up.  I've got some other pics to load and I'll do that when I get home.  This past Monday, I had the pleasure of accompanying the owner of the lodge I stayed at and one of the guides for some musky fishing on Lac Seul.  We headed out around 2:30.  We tried a few spots and then came to another.  I was throwing a topwater and saw this giant following it in.  I said "I've got a follow" and the guide said "speed it up".  I did and she followed it right to the boat.  As soon as I started my figure 8 ......BANG ...SHE NAILED IT.  My rod bent in half almost instantly and Greg (our guide) had the fish in the net.  I let out a huge YAAAAAA and I had my biggest fish of my life.  Here she is....52 inches and a 24 inch girth !!!!!!      Back you go Big Girl...thanks for one of the greatest moments of my fishing life.    We fished for a while after that and saw a total of 6 muskies that day.  I lost another one but I did take some comfort in that she wasn't as big as the girl I landed.  I went out with another guy from the lodge last night and we saw another 7 fish.  I can't describe how good the fishing is here.  I've certainly enjoyed my time here.  Jim
WOW!!! that fish is a tank.... I've been wanting to go that lake for the muskies just haven't had the opportunity. So many places to fish and not enough time.
Infreakingcredible. Wonderful fish!!! Im so jealous!!! Now I hate you!!!
its a shark
Gigantic is an understatement for that fish. I was up at Lac Seul this past May, but we only caught walleye, and no Musky. I wish I was in your shoes, great catch bud!
wow! that is a beautiful fish. Congrats!!

wow.....i mean WOW  thats a monster! congrats.......me jealous   i work in Sioux Lookout and fish Lac Seul fairly regularly for walleye ....looks like i'll have to buy me some musky gear....thanks for sharing.
Greg and Linda really have the Lac Seul big muskies dialed in.  Congrats on the pig and on a figure 8 as well.
Beauty fish for sure...  They are truely magnificent at that size.
WTG Jim. That almost looks like a Larry fish. I'm glad she made your day. You're spoiled now...you'll be scoffing at low 40" fish.
Congrats Jim that a great looking fish.  Mike
Holly Molly that a beaut, congrats Jim...
Congrats on a beautiful fish Jim!!!
Now that's.. a FISH!
THATS CRAZY!!!!
wicked nice!..you never forget the tales behind the ones that big
WOW! What a monster! You guys are really lucky to have the opportunities to fish these world class lakes!!!!
WOW!!!!!!!!!!    congrats on a fish of a lifetime  Peps
great job neat pics
Congrats Jim on your PB 'ski, and a beauty one at that too!  Stan
That is one gorgeous Muskie!!!  thanks for sharing and congrats on your PB  .....you'll have memories of that one for a long time!!
Incredible......Look at the size of this monster    Congratulation on your PB Jim  That is a fish of a life time....again great job and thanks for sharing! Leechman
awesome fish for sure!!!!!!!!  Cheers!
Great job Jim. Awesome fish!
That's just awesome Jim. Congrats!!
